snippet: Dean Baquet, 57, the new executive editor, had a malignant tumor removed from his kidney and plans to return to work in about a week.
abstract: Dean Baquet, new executive editor of The New York Times, announces that he had a malignant tumor removed from his kidney and plans to return to work in about a week.
lead_paragraph: Dean Baquet, 57, the new executive editor, had a malignant tumor removed from his kidney and plans to return to work in about a week.

headline.seo: Dean Baquet, Top Times Editor, Has Tumor Removed
headline.main: Executive Editor of The New York Times Is Treated for Cancer
headline.print_headline: Executive Editor of The New York Times Is Treated for Cancer
